name: Itsybitsy Spideroo
description:
Itsybitsy Spideroo is a small vertical platformer in the likes of Doodle Jump or Icy Tower - except your goal isn’t to go further up, it’s about going down! You’re a tiny Spider looking for your partner and all the clues lead you to a dried up well in the middle of the forest. It looks pretty deep… Welp, time to put on your crash helmet and go for a dive!

Programs used: Unity 2021.1.4f1, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, GitHub, Microsoft Visual Studio
